summary: Fixes the trophy rewards for the radiant thieves guild quest, so they can be picked up.
descriptionHtml:
Thieves Guild Treasure Fix
Version 1.0

What it does:
A simple Fix for the trophy rewards for the radiant thieves guild quests.
Previously, you could only pick up the trophies for the Litany of Larcency
Quest, while the other trophies and the Crown of Barenziah could not be
interacted with at all. This replaces the trophies as well as the crown,
with actual items, that can be picked up by the player.

Installation:
Just drop the provided .esp file in the Skyrim Data folder.

Compatibility:
This mod changes only the actual references in the Ragged Flagon. It should
therefore be compatible most mods that modify the Thieves Guild Quests.
However, mods that change the references might cause Problems (e.g. mods
that redecorate the Ragged Flagon).
It is also not compatible with the \"Playable Crown of Barenziah\" mod.
author: Tueffel
